title: Yasuo Running Graphics bug
body:
When yasuo runs, (like with home guards, or ghost, etc.), his running animation is glitches, in that he hold out his sword sheath like a javelin and his sword is sheathed by his side (but isn't in the sheath). 

I almost always play on Project: Yasuo, so this bug may be unique to the skin...or maybe its intended?

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're investigating!
This is a bug across all Yasuo skins and has been a thing since PROJECT came out

I think I seen some of the animations glitching and what not while i was playing a game of ARAM (with Project Yasuo equipped). Once i equipped the boots and gained movement, I noticed some glitching in it but I thought i was tripping.
